name: Flippy Goes Outside the Box
description:
Help Flippy by collecting all the coins in the cave so he can leave. Rotate the level to get to places he couldn't normally reach!

Controls
  • A: move left
  • D: move right
  • W or Space: Jump
  • J: rotate level counter-clockwise
  • K: rotate level clockwise
Credits
  • Art by Kenney
  • Sound by SubspaceAudio on OpenGameArt.org
Dev Notes

Three hours is barely enough time to get anything done, but I am pretty happy with how this turned out. The goal was to add a door or animation when you finished the level to leave the boxy level, hence the title. I also would have liked to add more levels with more challenges: spikes, enemies, and gaps in the wall you can fall through.
